Title: Makes it lawful for a person to possess an open container of alcohol and consume alcohol in public during the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Makes it lawful for a person to possess an open container of alcohol and consume alcohol in public in municipalities in which bars and/or restaurants are not operating at full capacity due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to making it lawful for a person to possess an open container of alcohol and to consume alcohol in public in municipalities in which bars and/or restaurants are not operating at full capacity due to the COVID-19 pandemic; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
